item.title: Education, health fees among key concerns
item.description: China to legislate on preschool education

item.title: Education, health fees among key concerns
item.description: China to legislate on preschool education

item.title: International group praises green revival
item.description: A high-level international advisory body applauded China's efforts to improve the environment and suggested a 15-year strategy against pollution in a draft recommendation report on Monday.

item.title: Russia’s Lavrov Says West Trying to ‘Block' Ukraine Peace Talks
item.description: The FM also accused Ukrainian authorities of 'attempts to disrupt the process that was laid down by Presidents Putin and Trump.'

item.title: Drone Shot Down by Russia Sparks Fire at Kursk Nuclear Plant
item.description: The “device detonated” upon impact at the Kursk Nuclear Power Plant, sparking a blaze which the facility said “was extinguished by fire crews.”

item.title: Kyrgyzstan Mission to Rescue Russian Climber Suspended
item.description: Natalia Nagovitsyna broke her leg while climbing the 7,439-meter Victory Peak and has been stranded in the mountains for 11 days.

item.title: Panamá amplía relaciones comerciales con República Dominicana
item.description: Ciudad de Panamá, 24 ago (Prensa Latina) Una misión comercial de Panamá en República Dominicana proyectó ventas por 13, 2 millones de dólares, trascendió hoy. The post Panamá amplía relaciones comerciales con República Dominicana first appeared on Noticias Pre

item.title: Simposio de Hip Hop Cubano pone en alto arte urbano
item.description: La Habana, 24 ago (Prensa Latina) El XVIII Simposio Internacional de Hip Hop Cubano culmina hoy en esta capital y con su amplia programación de cuatro jornadas intensas puso en alto el arte urbano. La cita combinó eventos teóricos, conciertos en vivo, artes pl

item.title: Asunción 2025: Cuba cumplió sus objetivos esenciales
item.description: Asunción, 24 ago (Prensa Latina) La delegación cubana en los II Juegos Panamericanos Junior de Asunción 2025 calificó hoy de cumplidos sus objetivos esenciales y destacó la trascendencia de un saldo deportivo que va más allá de los números. The post Asunción 2

item.title: Lao Foreign Minister Pays Courtesy Call on Mongolian Prime Minister
item.description: (KPL) As part of his official visit to Mongolia and participation in the 10th Foreign Ministers’ Meeting of the Forum for East Asia–Latin America Cooperation (FEALAC) on August 21, Foreign Minister of the Lao PDR Thongsavanh Phomvihane and his delegation paid
